name: The Great McButter Escape
description:
Turn off your light to avoid getting caught, but turn it on again to be able to use objects!

You are Johny McButter, the greatest bank robber and prison escapist of all time. You were recently caught by the FBI. Restricted to your sleeping cell mate, Slippy Pillow ( a narcoleptic snitch) by a two metre chain, you must find a way to escape without alerting the guard to your plans for freedom. No problem for the legendary McButter.

Made for Side Quest #5 - Two Metres

Controls

W & S - Move Up / Down

A & D - Move Left / Right

E to interact 

Q to turn flashlight on / off
